pageContext.claim: “Last year, American multinational companies left more than 70 percent of their foreign profits overseas because the current tax system penalizes them for bringing that money back home. ”
pageContext.analysis: The tax bill includes a tax holiday to encourage companies to bring profits back to the United States but economists expect much to be returned to shareholders as dividends or to pay down debt rather than spur investment. Meanwhile, the tax bill includes incentives that will encourage companies to move jobs overseas, economists say.
